segments.text: Which of the two do you think is better ? I mean , what's the difference between them ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well ... this one costs more , but it has a much better sound.This part of it is made of wood , not plastic . And there's a tone control , too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I only want it for the kitchen . I like to listen to the news at breakfast time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hmm ... well , the other one is good for the money . It's much cheaper . We sell clot of them and all our customers are satisfied with them .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hmm ... I'd like the cheaper one , please . Can I pay hy cheque ?
segments.speaker: S1
